content.label: Love the game. Crashes a bunch on iOS....
Super fun to play with the kids! Gets your blood pumping and helps you think on your feet!
Hello , and thank for making this game, but I wish to have some more updates as this game has potential
It’s so much fun to play with people
So much fun! I’m not interested in very many games and I love this one! So fun to shout all the silly instructions and laugh with a group.

title.label: The best party videogame I’ve ever played

content.label: Spaceteam is easily the best party game I’ve ever played. It’s extremely simple to just start playing, and while it becomes quite the shouting match at times, that just makes the experience all the better. Also, I recently discovered that there is a VR version, so I suggest you check that out if you have a headset.
Hey. I lost this for absolutely no reason. Highly reccomend a game that makes sense:/ cried a lot.
i recently downloaded this game out of curiosity and my friends are HOOKED! thanks for this amazing game :))
How are you supposed to flip the phone in order to get out of the wormhole?
WORMHOLES DONT WORK

I love this game... always have. I used to play it a lot with my sister and we would get all of our friends hooked. It is very well made yet at the same time simple which I can appreciate greatly in game design. If I could make one suggestion to the designers would be to add Spanish as a language option for space team or create a new app for a Spanish version like with the French. That being said in my eyes this game is a flawless classic.

Tetris is a game everyone loves because it is simple yet challenging. 

This game is hilarious, challenging and definitely opens up so much more than Tetris since you must be a team. 

I purchased just to support the creator (I want to see what this new game is all about) and was very happy with all my new goodies.

Almost every time I open the game I need to restore purchases. Which is easy once you see the little words at the bottom and the button to restore them.
Me and my brother played this we had a great time
This game is so much fun! I highly recommend it

I was introduced to this game by some of my friends a couple days ago, and I absolutely love it. Definitely spiced up a long car trip!

However, I’ve found that it crashes a lot and can be hard to stay connected with other people. I came home to play it with my siblings, but we struggle to play it because of how much it crashes, how long the load times are, or the signal will get lost during gameplay. Maybe because they have slightly older phones? They’re SE iPhones (the older, not the 2020).

Regardless, I still love this game and have gotten many laughs out of it and will definitely continue to play. I just wish it could pick up signals a tad bit better!

We spent a few hours playing this crazy and hilarious game at a family reunion. Switched teams every so often, which made it even more fun. Easy to learn, and makes everyone laugh trying to beat. I’ve played it in remote locations without internet access because you can connect via bluetooth. Fair warning: Doesn’t work between different OSs, so Android or iOS teams have to stay in their own universes. Well conceived. Probably best to have a protective cover on your phone so when you shake the controls it won’t go flying and get hurt, lol.
first found out about this game in a line at six flags n these three guys told me n my friend to download n play after we asked what they were doing 10/10 experience would forever keep this game
It’s fun to play with family and friends, that best part is you don’t need a WiFi connection(I don’t have WiFi) thanks for the good times
Very fun but very very difficult and not just one player. You need to have more then one.
Literally can't play. Keeps crashing as soon as I hit "ready."

Want your food delivered sooner at a restaurant? Pull this out and start playing with the group! You are sure to draw a lot of curious eyes. 

Delightful fun game involving communication, speed, and technobabble. Be sure to check out the upgrades, which add even more craziness.

title.label: Fun, simple cooperative game, excellent customer service

content.label: I love playing the game with friends. Had a technical issue and the developer responded to me right away and helped me fix the issue. Highly recommend the game and can’t wait to see what else Henry comes up with.
TOES

I played this with my friend and she loved it.  There was so much shouting by it was hilarious. Her sister walked in on us and was like what the heck are you saying. It can get really hard to say some of the words, but it is funny!! Truly one of the best games EVER!!!!!!! 👍😁😁
The game used to be good and work fine but now it won’t connect to WiFi or Bluetooth. Disappointed
And they have a VR version now! If only I had a headset!
I’ve never played the game
Don’t do it

Not worth your time 

Pros:none

Negatives:only one but it’s a huge problem YOU CAN NOT EVEN PLAY THE GAME 😡

title.label: Great Game but audio needs to be fixed

content.label: The game is great but my friends and I can’t hear each other after things get really hectic due to the overpowering sound of the game. There is also no option to remove the sound!
Fun!
Used to play this years ago and it was rock solid. Now just keeps crashing. 4 of us with iPhones with latest updates, Xs and SEs. Please fix, it’s ruining game night!

title.label: Not sure I understand how to play the game?

content.label:
Really wanted to like this game. Finally got SO convinced and we played together 2 player. Tried 3 times. Each times the instructions are completely nonsense. They say press this or do that. Nothing matches even remotely on both screens. 

Sounds like b s to me.
It’s good but you can ably play with people in your house and cause covid 19 I don’t have any friend to play with so many you can make it with like you and cpu
This game is the best the first time I played was with my Cusin and brother and we had sooooo much fun

This game is really exciting and makes everyone on edge, sometimes we r so engrossed in the game that we get mad at each other for not following the actions. This game helps people to work together and learn to communicate in hard times.I definitely recommend as it is very exciting. The more people the harder it gets. I think 2 people is the best number.
Great game very nerve racking and lots of shouting perfect for father son bonding:)

Just going through the apps I had installed on old phones & saw this app. Instantly brought me back to my freshman year of highs school when I had my 3 buddies & we’d play it everyday @ lunch for weeks. Brought so much laughter & smiles into our little friend group. Truly a great idea for an app & would love to see a “remake” of it again.
Don’t advertise this as a tvOS app if doesn’t work with the platform. Fix the issue or take down the listing.
Since sliced bread

Super fun quarantine game if you’re quarantined with other people. 

I️ tried to buy the upgrade and it keeps saying I️ need internet connection. One of these days! 

Thank you
4 of us ended up playing during a birthday weekend. So much fun!
Played several rounds. Never had any glitches. I am thinking about making my team at work play this once per day!

title.label: One of the greatest games ever created

content.label: So incredible. I love this game so hard.
It gets fast paced and we’re literally taking over each other and getting really into. After we play a few rounds we have cool our jets lol Thanks for making a fun game we really enjoy

title.label: Best game night In a long time

content.label:
So worth the free download ! We ended up shouting towards the end and bring us close to communication and decision making and cooperation. Team building and thinking game, of words to say to make the game fast . 
Exciting !
Very innovative game play. So much fun.
This is the funnest game on App Store. I force this game on coworkers, family, friends, and anyone who’s willing and we laugh uncontrollably every time.
Game is super fun and works perfectly cross platform. Try it and see if you like it. Also work on your pronunciations. YOU NEED TO ENUNCIATE!

I first got this app on a work trip to an elementary teacher’s conference a decade ago. My coworkers and I had such a lot of fun! It takes the right kind of group (folks who can deal with being stressed out and yelled at - what does that say about teachers?) Last year, my ESL-teacher friends and I played it at my birthday party and wow it’s still fun! This was the first app I ever bought anything in (indeed there have only been a few over the years), purely because it gave me so much joy that first weekend; I still enjoy using the “origami” theme and activating the ship’s cat. Glad to see it featured by Apple!
